message.body: hey, it's lauren, from ###? just thought i'd say hi...
Sorry for the delay.. I've been in a movie for a while. Out in Buford.
no problem, i've just been sitting around. what did see?
I saw Oz in imax in the front row. Nursing the biggest headache ever now. You should have texted me earlier! Could have done something. Be tall togetheror something.
ah, being tall with others... one of my favorite activities. sad i missed out on that tonight, haha.
There's always other times, of course. Why are you at home so early?? On a Saturday of all days.
My phone keeps putting your messages on the top. Something about daylight savings
oops, sorry i didn't reply to that. clearly i'm being a wild party animal on my spring break since i stayed home alone and went to bed early.
You know, you might just be the prettiest girl I've ever known. In my view of everything, I mean. Which will come off exceptional cheesy. But deal with it.
